summary: 2000 FORD TAURUS, BRAKE LAMP SWITCH ALWAYS STAYS ON.  NHTSA SHOWS THAT THERE WAS A RECALL FOR THIS PROBLEM.  FORD WOULD NOT HONOR THE RECALL ON MY CAR AND REPLACE  THE FAULTY BRAKE SWITCH, DEALER SAID MY CAR WAS NOT ONE  OF THE 157,000 CARS EFFECTED.  SO I HAD TO PAY $213.00  TO HAVE THEM REPLACE THE FAULTY BRAKE SWITCH THAT WAS  A PROBLEM LISTED AS A RECALL ON NHTSA.     NHTSA RECALL NO. 01V078/FORD RECALL NO. 01S08.  *AK
